Title: Wrecking the Wreck
Description:
To dislodge the alliance ship, we need to find our engineer. He parted ways with us when we were escaping the wreckage.

You should be able to find him somewhere in the western forest. Tell him Korga sent you and he'll get in line to help.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Makael Bay in the Pei-Wu Forest.
RewardText:
Korga sent you, eh? Well, I wouldn't mind doing a number on that ship for my own reasons anyway, but it's going to take some work.

Give me a moment to think...
